ygData.subject: RE: Bard Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: I think mine had stopped somewhere around there as well. I know I haven t seen an increase for a while. One thing I have noticed however is that you don t need
ygData.messageBody:
I think mine had stopped somewhere around there as well. I know I haven't
seen an increase for a while. One thing I have noticed however is that you
don't need to take damage from a fall for it to go up. I went up 5 skill
levels scooting around Everfrost off the riverbanks and taking no damage but
I'd increase my skill level in it. Now, it could very well be that you have
to take damage to increase it but I was taking so little damage that the
extra skill point was compensating for it. Another good place to practice
Safe Fall up to about 30ish is to go up a ladder and walk back off it. Can
get the skill up rather quickly there. (Just be sure to keep Hymn playing
cause you will go though health just as quick. =)

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Mike Roach [mailto:mroach@...]
8)Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 12:27 PM
8)To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
8)Subject: [eqbards] Bard Skill Caps
8)
8)
8)From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
8)
8)I hate to ask this question again because I know we have gone
8)over this
8)topic before on the list, but we have not discussed it for a while and
8)people might have some new data on it.
8)
8)I just made 24th a few days ago and got the "Safe Fall"
8)skill...I trained it
8)up to 40 and I don't seem to be able to take it any higher,
8)at least during
8)my initial trials - I fell from a high enough height to do
8)damage to myself
8)over and over (about 20 times or so) until I was down to 1
8)bubble of XP and
8)it would not raise above 40.
8)
8)Are we capped at 40 for Safe Fall? If so what a
8)let-down...not much real
8)improvement over not having it all from what I have observed.
8)
8)Does anyone on the list have any new or revised data on our
8)Bard Skill Caps
8)they could share with us?
8)
8)
8)- Faras "you have been hit for 23 damage non-melee" Tar'Linedhel
8) E'ci
8)
